item.title: 英国失业率逼近五年高位，薪资压力有所缓解
item.description: 英国失业率升至疫情以来最高水平，工资增长放缓，劳动力市场持续疲软，为春季可能降息埋下伏笔。【原文：UK unemployment reached its highest since the pandemic and wage growth eased as the labor market continued to weaken, setting up a potential interest-rate cut by the spring.】

item.title: Anthropic与Infosys将为企业打造定制化人工智能代理
item.description: 人类本位PBC公司已与印度科技企业印孚瑟斯有限公司建立合作关系，共同为电信、金融服务等多个领域的企业开发先进的人工智能解决方案。【原文：Anthropic PBC has partnered Indian technology firm Infosys Ltd. to develop advanced artificial intelligence solutions for companies across sectors including telecommunications and financial services.】

item.title: 英国12月工资增长放缓幅度超预期
印度官员称：若不提升技能水平，印度将失去人口红利优势
item.description: 印度财政部一位高级官员表示，除非印度在技能培训和教育方面迅速采取行动，否则该国将面临浪费人口红利、加剧不平等的风险。【原文：India risks squandering its demographic dividend and widening inequality unless it moves swiftly on skilling and education, a top finance ministry official said.】

item.title: 美国国债在市场重开后反弹，10年期国债收益率跌向4%
item.description: 上周美国国债的涨势延续至周二，因美国债券市场在假期后重新开放。【原文：Last week’s Treasuries rally extended into Tuesday as the US bond market reopened after a holiday.】

item.title: 想向波兰出售武器？部长称：那就来这里投资吧
item.description: 波兰向有意参与其1万亿兹罗提（2810亿美元）国防开支计划的外资企业发出明确信号："若想在此销售，就需在此投资。"【原文：Poland has a message for foreign companies interested in a piece of its 1 trillion zloty ($281 billion) defense spending plan: “If you want to sell here, invest here.”】

item.title: 中国AI初创企业雄心勃勃，目标估值达100亿美元
item.description: Moonshot正寻求在现有融资轮中实现100亿美元估值，该轮融资已获得阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司和腾讯控股有限公司的支持。该公司旨在借势中国初创企业开发人工智能模型的热潮，这些模型旨在与硅谷顶尖技术抗衡。【原文：Moonshot is targeting a valuation of $10 billion in an expansion of a funding round already backed by Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and Tencent Holdings Ltd., seeking to tap strong interest in Chinese startups creating AI models to rival Silicon Valley’s best.】

item.title: 波兰金融科技公司Blik的股东们讨论在华沙上市的可能性
item.description: 据知情人士透露，波兰金融科技公司Blik的股东已就该公司在华沙进行首次公开募股的可行性展开初步讨论。【原文：The owners of Polish fintech Blik held preliminary discussions about the merits of holding an initial public offering in Warsaw, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃及股市飙升，投资者关注经济复苏
item.description: 埃及基准股指正大幅领先于其他发展中国家同行，这得益于投资者对该市场的兴趣日益浓厚——该市场因政府振兴经济的举措而受益。【原文：Egypt’s benchmark stock index is soaring ahead of developing-nation peers, buoyed by growing investor interest in a market that’s seen benefiting from government measures to revive the economy.】

item.title: 津巴布韦成功控制通胀，现在面临的考验是将通胀率维持在10%以下
item.description: 津巴布韦年度通胀率自1997年以来首次跌破10%，这对这个曾与恶性通胀和万亿面值纸币画上等号的国家而言具有里程碑意义。如今的问题在于，这种稳定能否持续。【原文：Zimbabwe’s annual inflation rate has fallen below 10% for the first time since 1997, a milestone for a nation once synonymous with hyperinflation and trillion-dollar banknotes. The question now is whether the stability can last.】

item.title: 邦迪海滩——好吧，我们来聊聊道指
item.description:
在特朗普2.0执政期间，市场表现并不比其他近期总统任期更出色。

【原文：

The market’s performance under Trump 2.0 is no better than other recent presidencies.

】

item.title: 罗马尼亚维持利率不变，顽固通胀阻碍降息讨论
item.description: 罗马尼亚正准备维持欧盟最高利率之一，因为抗击高通胀的任务优先于缓解受经济衰退冲击的经济压力。【原文：Romania is poised to keep one of the highest interest rates in the European Union as the fight against elevated inflation takes precedence over easing the strain on the recession-hit economy.】

item.title: 工业金属在农历新年假期交易中走低
item.description: 铜和铝价格走低，因铜库存上升及关税不确定性打压市场情绪，加之许多亚洲交易员因农历新年假期离岗。【原文：Copper and aluminum edged lower as rising stockpiles of the red metal and tariff uncertainty weighed on sentiment, with many Asian traders away from their desks for the Lunar New Year break.】

item.title: 日本五年期国债拍卖需求低于12个月均值
item.description: 日本五年期国债拍卖需求低于过去12个月的平均水平，因投资者正审视财政政策前景及日本央行加息路径。【原文：Japan’s five-year government bond auction drew weaker demand than its 12-month average as investors mull the outlook for fiscal policy and the Bank of Japan’s rate-hike path.】

item.title: 印度财报季或为受人工智能冲击的牛市投资者提供救命稻草
item.description: 盈利增长正开始从少数几个行业扩展到更广泛的领域。【原文：Earnings growth is beginning to broaden beyond a handful of sectors.】

item.title: 活动人士帕利瑟入股卫浴制造商TOTO，布局人工智能领域
item.description: 激进投资基金Palliser Capital已入股日本智能马桶制造商东陶株式会社，并敦促该公司加大对其鲜为人知的芯片零部件业务的推广力度，以期从人工智能热潮中释放价值。【原文：Activist fund Palliser Capital has taken a stake in Japanese washlet maker Toto Ltd. and is pushing the firm to ramp up promotion of its little-known chip parts business in a bid to unlock value from the AI boom.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行在利率政策转向中观察到经济前景出现"重大"转变
item.description: 澳大利亚央行在2月2日至3日的会议纪要显示，当该行决定本月逆转政策并加息时，其评估认为经济前景已"发生重大转变"，尽管决策者并未暗示后续行动。【原文：Australia’s central bank assessed the economic outlook had “materially shifted” when it decided to execute a U-turn and raise interest rates this month, even as policymakers stopped short of signaling a follow-up move, minutes of its Feb. 2-3 meeting showed.】

item.title: Topshop入驻John Lewis百货，力图重振英国服装市场吸引力
item.description: Topshop和Topman服装将于周二在约翰·刘易斯公司上市销售，这标志着该品牌时隔五年后首次大规模登陆英国高街。【原文：Topshop and Topman clothing is set to go on sale at John Lewis Partnership Plc on Tuesday, marking the brands’ first large-scale appearance on British high streets in five years.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下X平台因Grok性暗示图片遭爱尔兰数据监管机构调查
item.description: 爱尔兰数据保护监管机构已对X平台展开调查，因担忧用户利用Grok人工智能聊天机器人创建并发布性化图像。【原文：Ireland’s data protection watchdog has launched an investigation into X over concerns about sexualized images created and published using the Grok AI chatbot.】

item.title: 莫迪借人工智能峰会彰显印度全球雄心，此前印度经历艰难一年
item.description: 六个月前，印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪正忙于应对美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的言语攻击，试图在武装冲突后重新掌握对巴基斯坦的优势，同时还要面对关于本国经济前景的质疑。【原文：Six months ago, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi was fending off verbal attacks from US President Donald Trump, trying to regain the upper hand over Pakistan after an armed conflict, and facing questions about his economy’s prospects.】

item.title: 日本央行前理事称4月可能加息
item.description: 日本央行前理事表示，该行很可能将4月份公布的一系列新数据作为加息契机，无视市场对3月可能加息的猜测。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to seize on a raft of new data available in April as an opportunity to raise its benchmark interest rate, looking past rumblings in the market over the possibility of a move in March, according to a former BOJ board member.】

item.title: 人工智能恐慌重创印度IT股，市值蒸发560亿美元
item.description: 对于看好印度科技服务行业的投资者而言，"人工智能恐慌交易"创造了买入那些能够经受住末日预言考验的公司股票的机会。【原文：For investors bullish on India’s technology services industry, the “AI scare trade” has created an opportunity to buy shares of companies that are able to survive the doomsday predictions.】

item.title: 金价维持在5000美元附近，春节假期抑制交易活动
item.description: 黄金在早盘交易中基本持平，因亚洲多数市场因农历新年休市，且美国周一刚结束假期。【原文：Gold was little changed in early trade, with much of Asia closed for the Lunar New Year and after a US holiday on Monday.】

item.title: 伊朗举行海军演习前夕油价上涨
item.description: 在伊朗于周二晚些时候与美国恢复谈判前夕，于该地区主要海上运输要道附近举行海军演习后，油价较上周五收盘价有所上涨。【原文：Oil advanced from Friday’s close after Iran carried out naval drills near a major regional transit chokepoint before talks with the US are set to resume later Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市假期交易料将平淡开局：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周二开盘表现平淡，因假期导致交易量萎缩，投资者正等待本周晚些时候公布的新一轮经济数据以确定方向。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for a subdued start Tuesday, with holiday-thinned trading keeping volumes light as investors await a fresh round of economic data later this week for direction.】

item.title: 必和必拓利润攀升，铜价飙升抵消中国对铁矿石需求拖累
item.description: 必和必拓集团截至12月的半年盈利增长逾两成，得益于铜价飙升，尽管中国需求趋缓拖累了其铁矿石和炼焦煤业务。【原文：BHP Group’s earnings for the six months to December rose by more than a fifth thanks to a surge in copper prices, even as plateauing demand in China weighed on its iron ore and steelmaking coal businesses.】

item.title: 智利樱桃对华出口因供过于求、需求滞后表现欠佳
item.description: 智利樱桃在中国的销售遭遇连续第二个令人失望的季度，原因是该国在农历新年假期前过早出口了过多水果，而该假期期间通常是消费高峰期。【原文：Chile notched a second disappointing season of cherry sales in China after exporting too much fruit too far ahead of the Lunar New Year holiday when consumption traditionally peaks.】

item.title: 苹果重塑视频播客，行业转向视觉化
item.description: 苹果公司正在对其Apple Podcasts的视频内容进行全面升级，此举是整个行业向视觉化转型的一部分——这种曾经仅限于音频的媒介正迎来变革浪潮。【原文：Apple Inc. is revamping its video offering in Apple Podcasts as part of a broader industry shift toward visuals in the once audio-only medium.】

item.title: SpaceX将参与五角大楼无人驾驶无人机技术竞赛
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃隆·马斯克旗下的SpaceX及其全资子公司xAI正参与五角大楼一项保密竞赛，旨在研发语音控制的自主无人机群集技术。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX and wholly owned subsidiary xAI are competing in a secretive new Pentagon contest to produce voice-controlled, autonomous drone swarming technology, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔力推欧元计价稳定币用于支付
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员约阿希姆·纳格尔表示，以欧元计价的稳定币可成为低成本国际汇款的有效工具，有助于补充欧洲央行推动数字共同货币的举措。【原文：Euro-denominated stablecoins can be a valuable tool for cheap international transfers, supplementing the European Central Bank’s push for a digital common currency, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】
